projectGridLines.stationName: Flipkart Internet Pvt Ltd - Business Development,Bengaluru
projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Students will be working with the Category Development and M3 teams at  Flipkart on Business Development projects
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Students will be working with the Category Development and M3 teams at

Flipkart on Business Development projects with teams across categories such

as Fashion, Shopsy, etc. Please refer to the JD for more info

Skill sets:

Preferably having Knowledge of supply strategies, supply planning, supply chain

operations, inventory planning, demand forecasting

Desirable:Strong analytical, problem solving, communication skills & team work

Good at excel/ R / Python

Expected learning:

? Business development

? Stakeholder Mgmt

? Negotiation skills

? Understanding of consumer strategy

? Offer construct designing

? On-site merchandising

? Marketing channel play

The role involves high interaction with Flipkart products & necessitates a

collaborative individual who can build robust plans, understand complex tech

products, build system configurations, negotiate and influence business

partners across different functions at Flipkart.
